application.name: MyYahoo
application.description: MyYahoo is a small application to show you how easy it is to create a program like the topic/url/search kind of interface first shown on yahoo. It depends on the Resources application.
application.install-notice:
Example urls/topics/etc are installed, see the mmexamples page for the example pages. This application also installed the jumpers builder. The jumpers servlet uses this builder to define url shortcuts. In order to install the jumpers servlet, you need to add the following code to your web.xml:
<filter> <filter-name>Jumpers Filter</filter-name> <display-name>Jumpers Filter</display-name> <description>Filter used for jumpers</description> <filter-class>org.mmbase.servlet.JumpersFilter</filter-class> </filter>
<filter-mapping> <filter-name>Jumpers Filter</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern> </filter-mapping>
And restart your server. Note that this may not work in Orion 1.5.2 or lower. See the release notes for more information on installing the jumpers servlet.
